title: Governor Cox Says America Welcomes Everyone for the 2034 Olympics
summary: Governor Spencer Cox of Utah spoke at the Olympics in Milan to tell people that the United States is still a friendly and welcoming place. He was talking about the 2034 Winter Olympics, which will be held in Utah. Some people in Europe were worried about politics in the U.S., but Cox said that America welcomes visitors and athletes. He explained that the U.S. has elections and different opinions, but it remains a welcoming country. The governor wants everyone to feel excited about the upcoming games in Salt Lake City.
